meanings.definition: A device used for throwing objects.
meanings.sent1: He used a chucker to launch the ball far across the field.

meanings.definition: To throw something carelessly or casually.
meanings.sent1: She would often chucker her clothes on the chair after a long day.
meanings.sent2: He decided to chucker the paper airplane across the room playfully.
